long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cast from your Chromebook directly to your Clevertouch interactive Display! This application only works with Clevershare version 2 (Now available!). Please check if a firmware update is available via Settings>About>Check for updates on your Clevertouch. Please note this app does not cast touch functionality.
